qas.question: In what year did Gaddafi resign from his position in the GPC?
Prior to his resignation, what office did Gaddafi occupy in the GPC?
After Gaddafi stepped down from the GPC, what title did he take?
What authority did Gaddafi have over the Libyan armed forces?

context: In December <a0_0>1978<a0_0/>, Gaddafi stepped down as <a1_0>Secretary-General<a1_0/> of the GPC, announcing his new focus on revolutionary rather than governmental activities; this was part of his new emphasis on separating the apparatus of the revolution from the government. Although no longer in a formal governmental post, he adopted the title of "<a2_0>Leader of the Revolution<a2_0/>" and continued as <a3_0>commander-in-chief<a3_0/> of the armed forces. He continued exerting considerable influence over Libya, with many critics insisting that the structure of Libya's direct democracy gave him "the freedom to manipulate outcomes".
